mapper.select: SELECT name FROM tb_userinfo WHERE loginID = #{loginID}
SELECT DISTINCT manufac FROM tb_item_info WHERE manufac IS NOT NULL
SELECT cust_id, cust_name FROM tb_cust_info ORDER BY cust_name
SELECT DISTINCT major_class FROM tb_item_info WHERE manufac = #{manufac}
SELECT DISTINCT sub_class FROM tb_item_info WHERE manufac = #{manufac} AND major_class = #{major_class}

SELECT tpi.target_date, tci.cust_name, tii.manufac, tii.major_class, tii.sub_class, tii.item_name, tpi.goal_qut, tpi.perform_qut, tpi.plan_note, tpi.loginID, tu.name, tpi.plan_num, tpi.cust_id, tpi.item_code FROM tb_plan_info tpi LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_cust_info tci ON tpi.cust_id = tci.cust_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_item_info tii ON tpi.item_code = tii.item_code LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_userinfo tu ON tpi.loginID = tu.loginID WHERE plan_num = #{detailPlanNum}
mapper.insert:
SELECT COALESCE(max(plan_num), 0) + 1 AS plan_num FROM tb_plan_info
INSERT INTO tb_plan_info ( plan_num, loginID, cust_id, item_code, target_date, goal_qut, perform_qut, plan_note ) VALUES ( #{plan_num}, #{loginID}, #{cust_id}, #{item_code}, #{target_date}, #{goal_qut}, #{perform_qut}, #{plan_note} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_plan_info SET cust_id = #{cust_id}, item_code = #{item_code}, target_date = #{target_date}, goal_qut = #{goal_qut}, perform_qut = #{perform_qut}, plan_note = #{plan_note} WHERE plan_num = #{detailPlanNum}
